Button

button desc

Basics

Basics desc

/* Anchors (links) */ a(href="about.html" class="button") Anchors /* Buttons (actions) */ button(type="button" class="success button") success button(type="button" class="alert button") alert
Anchors

Sizing

Sizing desc

button(type="button" class="tiny button") So Tiny button(type="button" class="small button") So Small button(type="button" class="button") So Basic button(type="button" class="large button") So Large button(type="button" class="expanded button") Such Expand button(type="button" class="small expanded button") Wow, Small Expand

Coloring

Coloring desc

button(type="button" class="button") primary button(type="button" class="secondary button") Secondary button(type="button" class="success button") Success button(type="button" class="alert button") Alert button(type="button" class="warning button") Warning button(type="button" class="disabled button") Disabled

Hollow Style

Hollow Style desc

button(type="button" class="hollow button") primary button(type="button" class="hollow secondary button") Secondary button(type="button" class="hollow success button") Success button(type="button" class="hollow alert button") Alert button(type="button" class="hollow warning button") Warning button(type="button" class="hollow disabled button") Disabled

Dropdown Arrows Style

Dropdown Arrows Style desc

button(type="button" class="tiny dropdown button") Dropdown Button button(type="button" class="small dropdown button") Dropdown Button button(type="button" class="dropdown button") Dropdown Button button(type="button" class="large dropdown button") Dropdown Button button(type="button" class="expanded dropdown button") Dropdown Button
